replies.body:
Nope, an exception is a branch-rule that overrides the original. The exception says that there is no exceptions to the rule "All rules have exceptions." 
I feel like it would be a lot less confusing if you didn't say "exception" so much xD
replies.body_tagged:
Nope, an exception is a branch-rule that overrides the original. The exception says that there is no exceptions to the rule "All rules have exceptions." 
I feel like it would be a lot less confusing if you didn't say "exception" so much xD
